Audio Description: This bright red poster promotes citizen investment in war bonds. The words: “Buy Now for the Bigger 7th War Loan Through Payroll Savings” are printed in white on the bottom half of the poster. In the upper portion of the poster is a crowd of people holding up green dollars in their hands. In the front of the crowd is a middle-aged, muscular man wearing a brown shirt with rolled up sleeves and blue coveralls. He is holding a brown lunch box. To the right is a dark haired woman wearing a blue shirt and blue skirt. Behind them are a broad spectrum of Americans, including an African-American man dressed in blue coveralls, a man wearing a brown suit and brown fedora, and a woman wearing a green jacket and skirt with white gloves.
Creator: United States. Treasury Department. War Finance Division
